snippet: FanDuel announced that it was permanently barring its employees from playing daily fantasy games on any site and was prohibiting employees of other companies from playing on its site.
abstract: Fantasy football site FanDuel, in response to fraud inquiry by New York Attorney Gen Eric T Schneiderman, bars employees from playing daily games on other fantasy sports sites and bars employees of other sites from playing on theirs.

byline.original: By JOE DRAPE and JACQUELINE WILLIAMS

lead_paragraph: FanDuel announced that it was permanently barring its employees from playing daily fantasy games on any site and was prohibiting employees of other companies from playing on its site.
